data.description:
Professor, Archivist, Clerk, Nurse, Academic, Game Designer

 

Special Abilities

Deduction: Once per game session, you can apply your powers of deduction and reasoning to reach an apposite conclusion; the GM must provide a hint to the next best step.

Choose two from the following:

  • Iron Mind: Roll with Advantage on Saves when resisting magic, occult ritual, hexes, curses, or possession by alien influences.
  • Erudite: Once per game hour, you can automatically succeed with a single INT or WIS Save.
  • MacGyver: Once per session, you can improvise a solution to a situation using available tools, devices, and uncommon lore.
